name: Witches' Spell List
description:
Witches' Spell List is a very simple game inspired from Shakespeare's play The Tragedy of Macbeth. It's the first game I released, and my first jam entry.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move,mouse click to kill enemies.

E to skip the dialog.

Unfortunately, I couldn't complete the game as I wanted and cut a lot of the gameplay, couldn't implement the animations and the other 2 levels which will complete the story. But I wanted to release the game because finally I could finally finish a jam with a playable(sort of) game. Thank you for your time for playing it.
